description.p: Project leader for developing physics and data based prediction software.

bulletedlist.item: Leveraged industry contacts to secure software licenses and access open-source solutions, resulting in accelerating the modeling program by 5 years and a cost savings of \$1MM.

Designed and developed a generalized Python library to analyze and plot high frequency time-series data. The library includes signal processing algorithms, finite precision arithmatic mathematics, and automatic units handling. By design, the data plotting is separated from plot formatting. Saves 70-95\% of code writing when analyizing and plotting data.
Designed LLM prompts to summarize large documents and extract structured content from document collections. Reduced data summarization and report writing time by 95\%.
Managed software projects utilizing in-house and third party resources.
Mentored and guided software developers and researchers.
